statement.p: Find the perimeter and area of the trapezoid above. Side lengths are measurements.
The bottom has length \displaystyle{14.98}; top has length \displaystyle{9.25}. The sides have lengths \displaystyle{8.39} and \displaystyle{9.32}. The height is \displaystyle{8.27}.

solution.p: The perimeter is the sum of the four sides which are given. \displaystyle{9.25}+{9.32}+{14.98}+{8.39}={41.94}.
